name: Sushi Cat (itch)
description:
Hey! This is Sushi Cat, where you play a waiter trying to get the fish to the hungry cats.

Made during the GBC 2018 February 12 hour game jam, it's the first game I've made and it does meet the minimum requirements to be a game!

Objective: Get the right colour fish to the right cat! However, if you drop 10 pieces of fish, you're fired!

Controls:

Left/Right - Move Tray

Space - Start Game/Spawn more fish

Enter - Play again!
